metadata.title: CVE-2017-18187 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In ARM mbed TLS before 2.7.0, there is a bounds-check bypass through aninteger overflow in PSK identity parsing in thessl_parse_client_psk_identity() function in library/ssl_srv.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-18187` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmbedcrypto0 - 2.2.1-2ubuntu0.3
libmbedtls10 - 2.2.1-2ubuntu0.3
libmbedx509-0 - 2.2.1-2ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mbedtls package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.2.1-2ubuntu0.3').
